CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 25, 1941, pg. 8, reads: "It was fun and more fun at the birthday party of cute little Marcia Nickens, daughter of Dr. and Mrs. Garfield Nickens, last Saturday. The little guests were very happy when they went to their homes tired from play and satisfied with the many good things to eat.  The guests were: Carol Ann Jones, Nancy Lou Jones, Jeanine Henry, James Henry Jr., Jacqueline George, Jean Stanton, Billy Chandler, Joyce Ann Robinson, Marcia Nickens, Garfield Nickens Jr., Geraldine Jackson, Charles Jackson, Gloria Bolden, Billy Dorsey, Jimmy Robinson, Byrd Brown, Lois Simms, Sylvia King, Ra..., William Robinson, Everett Utterback Jr., Malvin Goode Jr, Barbara Pettey, Dorothy Lou San..."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of children, some wearing party hats, including girl in front wearing conical hat and dark dress with elbows on table, for birthday party of Marcia Nickens, in her home with lace tablecloth and blinds
